markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Empty Inside](/Spells.aspx?ID=626)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 119 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Void](/Domains.aspx?ID=56)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You inject a sliver of the void into your mind, momentarily remaking it into a bleak and empty place. Attempt a counteract check against one [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effect affecting you.

---
**Heightened (5th)** You can attempt counteract checks against any number of emotion effects affecting you.
name: Empty Inside
